Class ConfirmPopup

java.lang.Object
org.supsi.view.info.ConfirmPopup
All Implemented Interfaces:
IConfirmPopup
public class ConfirmPopup extends Object implements IConfirmPopup
Represents a confirmation popup dialog. Provides a user interface with "Confirm" and "Cancel" buttons to determine whether the user wants to proceed.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      void initialize()
      Initializes the confirmation popup. Sets up the stage and defines the behavior for the "Confirm" and "Cancel" buttons.

    • showConfirmationDialog

      public boolean showConfirmationDialog()
      Displays the confirmation dialog and waits for the user's response.
      Specified by:
      showConfirmationDialog in interface IConfirmPopup
      Returns:
      true if the user clicked "Confirm", false if the user clicked "Cancel"
